short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ERP,is a software system designed to integrate the functional areas of an organization's business processes into a unified system

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ERP, or enterprise resource planning, is a modular software system designed to integrate the main functional areas of an organization's business processes into a unified system.
